attributes.description: Sheer Luxury, Extremely Comfortable And A Pleasure To Drive. The Fully Specced Lexus RX 450h F Sport Is Out There To Impress You. Our 2012 Model Is Presented In Grey Metallic With A Black Leather Interior. It Has Covered 250 000 km And Retains A Full Service History, Books And Spare Keys. Features Include A Glass Sunroof, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, Reverse Camera, Xenon Lights, Cruise Control, Multi Functional Steering Wheel, Electric Seats With Memory, Heated Seats, Bluetooth, CD Player, Climate Control, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint, Electric Tailgate And 19 Inch Alloy Wheels. This Is A Pinnacle Example Of The Luxury Lexus Brand. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
